item.description:
This meetup was created for anyone who wouldn't want to be at the beach during the day. but would like to join us later on for the evening festivities.
There are several events happening @ the beach . FREE entertainment begins @ noon at The Sea Shell Stage. From 12-4pm there is a DJ spinning.. From 7-? The Continentals ...they do put on a very good show. All the cafes and bars are open.

FIREWORKS ON THE BEACH : begin @ 9:30pm

THE BOARDWALK: various food, beverages, shops & arcades open.

ENTERTAINMENT @ THE BEACH:

*The Board Walk Cafe: Anthony Ambrosino @ 9pm
Johnny Angle on the deck 8pm -11pm
* La Bec Rouge: 3 Olives Vodka Drinks $5.00 (tall)
3 floors of entertainment. Underground pub, Aboveground Pub & Restaurant
Ocean View Deck
* Ashworth By the Sea: In the Breakers Lounge- DJ with lots of dancing
*NOTE: This will be a fun night! We will meetup on the sidewalk outside of The Board Walk Cafe @ 191 Ocean Blvd. We wait 10 minutes for "yes" RSVPs.... We do not wait for maybes.
If the weather report isn't a good one, please check for an update before heading out.
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup on the sidewalk outside BoardWalk Cafe @ 191 Ocean Blvd.
item.name: Independence Festivities @ Hampton Beach NH
